title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1159.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1159.1 - Scope

State Regulations

Set forth herein are comprehensive guidelines established for
the purpose of governing the procurement of goods and services by the Niagara

Frontier Transportation Authority and Niagara Frontier Transit Metro System, Inc. (together the authority). The Greater Buffalo-Niagara Regional

Transportation Council (GBNRTC) and the Niagara International Transportation

Technology Coalition (NITTEC), for which the authority serves in a limited
capacity as "host agency," has agreed to procure goods and services consistent
with these guidelines. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1159.1

Amended

New

York State Register March 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
